name: viewport-extra
description: Enable to set min-width and max-width to viewport

scripts.build: tsc --module umd --target es5 --outDir dist/umd && tsc --module commonjs --target esnext --outDir dist/commonjs && tsc --module esnext --target esnext --outDir dist/esnext && terser dist/umd/index.js -o dist/umd/index.min.js -m -c

author: dsktschy (https://github.com/dsktschy)
